N = int(input())
change = 1000 - N % 1000
print(change)


import sys

N = int(input())

# get the number of 500-yen coins
num_of_coins = N // 500

# get the amount of change
change = 500 * num_of_coins - N

print(change)

N = int(input())
change = 1000 - (N % 1000)

print(change)

N = int(input())
change = 1000 - N % 1000
print(change)


N = int(input())
change = 1000 - N % 1000 if N % 1000 != 0 else 0
print(change)
